links.name: Alright Ghosty McGhost, I believe you.

passages.name: It's easy, don't worry.

passages.text:
It's a simple guessing game. Guess the number, in fact. How old do you think I am?
[[Over 300]]
[[In your twenties]]
[[Too old]]
[[I have no clue]]

passages.text:
Over 300
[[I guess that's sort of right. I ... became a ghost ... when I was 26, but that was a long time ago.]]

I guess that's sort of right. I ... became a ghost ... when I was 26, but that was a long time ago.

[[So how old are you actually?]]
